article_title: Adobe Profit Slides as Product Sales Decline
article_text:
Adobe Systems Inc. said its fiscal fourth-quarter profit tumbled 71% as the software company reported a sharp drop in product sales and higher sales and marketing expenses.

The company also issued targets for the new year that missed Wall Street's expectations.

Adobe, the maker of Photoshop and Illustrator design software for creative...
